Question: This person won the match, 6–3, 4–6, 6–2, 6–4.
Hints: Being six years older than this person, Nastase won ten of their first eleven meetings.
In October 2005, this person had successful hip-replacement surgery at Cedars-Sinai Medical Center in Los Angeles.
This person won three year-end championship titles, including two WCT Finals and one Masters Grand Prix.
